name: Sprint 100 multiplay supported
description:
[Features]
- Somewhat realistic 3D Game
- Unique athletes
- Leveling Up
- Multiplayer (online)
- Olympics style track and field
- Free-to-Play
- Your arm will get tired


Give it a try right now!!


***** Works with 64bit Devices (iPhone5S+, iPad Air+) *****
Devices with low performance may not work properly..
